meanings: (아주 친함) close friendship, 지친하다 (be) very close[intimate]
(친족) close relatives, members of one's immediate family
(기운이 빠지다) be[get, become] tired, be exhausted, be worn out, (formal) be fatigued
(싫증이 나다) be (sick and) tired (of), (informal) be fed up (with), be weary[bored] of (doing)
(얼음 위를 달리다) slide[play] on the ice, (스케이트를 신고) skate
an old fogy retired from a teaching position
an old-time retiree, a rejected person

vlive.korean: 아니, 그게 아니라 지금 지친 거야 - 지친 거야? No, I am tired. - Are you? 듣기 View video 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #시우민] EP04 # 멤버들과첫집들이 #시끌벅적손님 #잘먹겠습니다
vlive.english: No, I am tired. - Are you?

examples.korean: Take a warm bath to soothe tense, tired muscles. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 긴장되고 지친 근육을 풀어 주려면 따뜻한 물에 목욕을 하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She came out of the ordeal looking thin and worn. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 몹시 여위고 지친 모습으로 그 혹독한 시련을 벗어났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
